Author: anonymouseds
Text: I use kcups with my keurig and drink it black or I drink espresso or lattes made with macademia nut milk from my nespreso machine.

Author: SweatshirtHoe
Text: I have a Keurig so I get a flavored coffee and drink it black. It's not the highest quality, so I usually put a little splash of slim milk in there too. That usually does it for me in <30 calories. I've tried the powdered creamer but I prefer real dairy. The powdered stuff is meh but is definitely good in a pinch
